::Rex::

Rex had spun around as he heard a sound behind him, his lips stretching into 
a smile as he saw a ball of light fly out of nowhere, clogging one of the 
flamethrowers. As BrightBlade clogged the rest, Rex aims his gun at the space 
where the energy was emerging from (where BB is standing), and fires.

The autoguns spin around, firing in the same direction as Rex.
